title: Skyscraper city
caption: Join the scrum in Tokyo
desc: Lighting up this vast metropolis is Tokyo Tower, the perfect place to get a great view of one of the world’s busiest and most exciting cities. It was the tallest free-standing tower in the world at 333m (1,092ft), when it was built in 1958 – although that title has since been taken by its newer neighbour, the 634m (2,080ft) Tokyo Skytree.
copyright: Tokyo cityscape at sunset, Japan (© rudi1976/Alamy)
